title: Get CAR MODEL-belongs-to-BRAND Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to know to which BRAND a specific CAR MODEL is connected to\
So I can verify the correctness of the relationship
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a JSON object containing the following relationship data:
  * `brand_id`: integer
  * `car_model_id`: integer
  * `relationship_id`: integer
  * `relationship_name`: string
* when there is no brand connected an empty body is returned (200)

**Unhappy path**

* 404 when car model does not exist

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the brand is returned when there is one is attached to the car model
* 200 and an empty body is returned when no brand is attached
* a 404 is returned when the car model does not exist

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
